plot: Grimmer investigates Petrov, who was present at the 511 Kinderheim revolt.

Grimmer is a freelance journalist who is investigating what happened at 511 Kinderheim. After parting ways with Tenma, he meets Reinhardt, the former director of 511 Kinderheim, who is going by the name Pedrov. Reinhardt turns Grimmer away, telling him that his experiment was successful until he quit as director.—Anonymous
